nodes.text: The Dressia system was located in the Northern Dependencies portion of the Colonies. It shared its name with the Dressian Kiolsh Merchant Bank, a bank with vaults located on the Outer Rim Territories planet Mygeeto.
The Dressia system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-8.
